t: What Amazon packages require a signature? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 3): All deliveries to commercial addresses have to be signed. For residential, if the shipper asks for a “Signature Required” or if the package is of high value. It also depends on the driver’s discretion. Generally, they leave a package at the door of single-family homes ...

t: Prime members can save on the brand new Amazon Kindle Colorsoft Signature Edition
s: January 17, 2025 - Amazon's Kindle Colorsoft Signature Edition (32GB) is currently marked down to $229.99 for Prime members. This is 18% off its list price of $279.99, allowing you to pocket $50. If you've been hoping to upgrade your e-reader or want to start building a digital library, this Kindle is a great option to invest in.
